Fit XGBoost Poisson Model for Goal Prediction

Source: R/match_prediction.R
fit_goals_xgb.Rd

Fits an XGBoost model with Poisson objective for predicting goal counts. Uses time-based cross-validation with early stopping.

Usage

fit_goals_xgb(
  X,
  y,
  nfolds = 5L,
  params = NULL,
  nrounds = 500L,
  early_stopping = 30L,
  verbose = 1L
)

Arguments

X

Feature matrix

y

Target vector (goal counts)

nfolds

Number of CV folds (default 5)

params

XGBoost parameters (default Poisson regression)

nrounds

Max boosting rounds (default 500)

early_stopping

Patience for early stopping (default 30)

verbose

Print progress (default 1)

Value

List with model, cv_result, best_nrounds, metadata
